chemBox.name: ChemBox
chemBox.description:
SPWA built with React that hosts several chemistry study tools for intro chemistry students

Group project that developed teamwork and communication skills; Consistently received community feedback to improve site

restaurantRecommender.name: Restaurant Recommender
restaurantRecommender.description:
GUI in Java that takes user preferences and suggests a restaurant from a manually created dataset

Applied knowledge of database management and OOP

loreePortolio.name: Loree's Portfolio
loreePortolio.description:
SPWA built in javascript with Bootstrap front-end and Contentful CMS to display friend’s art collection.

Improved knowledge of database management and front end design

Danny's Dolls.name: Danny's Dolls
Danny's Dolls.description:
SPWA built in javascript with Contentful CMS to display friend’s doll collection.

First experience with databases and external importing

coffeeTalk.name: Coffee Talk
coffeeTalk.description:
Website in html and css that hosts my articles about local coffee shops

Focus on learning static front end design, first web dev project that sparked my passion
